foreignData.name: Tempel der Bosheit
foreignData.text:
Der Tempel der Bosheit kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Wenn der Tempel der Bosheit ins Spiel kommt, wende Hellsicht 1 an.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {R}.

foreignData.name: Templo de la malicia
foreignData.text:
El Templo de la malicia entra al campo de batalla girado.
Cuando el Templo de la malicia entre al campo de batalla, adivina 1.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R}.

foreignData.name: Temple de la malice
foreignData.text:
Le Temple de la malice arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Quand le Temple de la malice arrive sur le champ de bataille, regard 1.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R}.

foreignData.name: Tempio dell'Odio
foreignData.text:
Il Tempio dell'Odio entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
Quando il Tempio dell'Odio entra nel campo di battaglia, profetizza 1.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R}.

foreignData.name: 悪意の神殿
foreignData.text:
悪意の神殿はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
悪意の神殿が戦場に出たとき、占術１を行う。
{T}：{B}か{R}を加える。

foreignData.name: Templo da Maleficência
foreignData.text:
Templo da Maleficência entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Templo da Maleficência entrar no campo de batalha, use vidência 1.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {R}.

foreignData.name: Храм Злобы
foreignData.text:
Храм Злобы выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
Когда Храм Злобы выходит на поле битвы, предскажите 1.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {R}.

foreignData.name: 恶意殿堂
foreignData.text:
恶意殿堂须横置进战场。
当恶意殿堂进战场时，占卜1。
{T}：加{B}或{R}。

foreignData.name: 惡意殿堂
foreignData.text:
惡意殿堂須橫置進戰場。
當惡意殿堂進戰場時，占卜1。
{T}：加{B}或{R}。

name: Temple of Malice
originalText:
Temple of Malice enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Malice enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

rulings.text: When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.

text:
Temple of Malice enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Malice enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
